item.title: Trump-aligned super PAC enters 2026 midterms with nearly $300M war chest
item.description: The Trump-aligned super PAC reported nearly $300 million in cash on hand in a new FEC filing as Republicans gear up for the 2026 midterm elections.

item.title: Key takeaways from Jack Smith's testimony to House Judiciary Committee
item.description: Smith, a former career federal prosecutor who led the special counsel probe into Trump prior to his reelection, testified last month for eight hours.

item.title: DOGE says agencies cut $1.6B in federal contracts, flags spending on Somalia, HHS web services
item.description: Federal agencies axed contracts including $47M Somalia military support and $19.5M health website as DOGE pushes government efficiency under President...

item.title: Hochul orders NY landmarks, including One World Trade Center, lit green for Muslim American Heritage Month
